dcterms:description: Photo-Chromeleon allows reprogramming the surface texture of an object within an hour using a projection system, supporting users in customizing 3D physical objects with their desired patterns.
dcterms:title: Photo-Chromeleon

dcterms:description: Style2Fab allows users to retain their desired functionality in 3D models while personalizing them based on their desired style, taking into account post-fabrication functional constraints.
dcterms:title: Style2Fab

dcterms:creator: Oscar Michel

dcterms:description: Text2Mesh enables text-driven neural stylization for meshes, allowing for the generation of customized 3D models based on user input.
dcterms:title: Text2Mesh
